Package com.badlogic.gdx.tiledmappacker

Class TileSetLayout

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.tiledmappacker.TileSetLayout
public class TileSetLayout extends Object
Contains extra information that can only be calculated after a Tiled Map's tile set images are loaded.

  • Constructor Details

    • TileSetLayout

      protected TileSetLayout​(int firstgid, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileSet tileset, com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle baseDir) throws IOException
      Constructs a Tile Set layout. The tile set image contained in the baseDir should be the original tile set images before being processed by TiledMapPacker (the ones actually read by Tiled).
      Parameters:
      tileset - the tile set to process
      baseDir - the directory in which the tile set image is stored
      Throws:
      IOException
